content: If only I had a small garden. I could raise them there and watch their graceful wings shimmer and flutter about every day...
info: NPC星湾标签-好感标签1-1005幻雪_1005-幻雪

content: Anyway, I couldn't help but observe their movements closely, and that's how I found out I was... {A打喷嚏}allergic to their scales!
info: NPC星湾标签-好感标签1-1005幻雪_1005-幻雪

content: {A思考星光}Actually, I almost went down the path of researching <style=Highlight>butterflies</style>. When I'm reading, I often find <style=Highlight>butterflies</style> perched on my head and shoulder during breaks.
info: NPC星湾标签-好感标签1-1005幻雪_1005-幻雪

content: {A喜欢}When you immerse yourself in your interests, time flies by, more imperceptible than the flutter of a butterfly's wings.
info: NPC星湾标签-好感标签1-1005幻雪_1005-幻雪
